generator: married(Y,X) :- married(X,Y), X != Y. sibling(X,Y) :- parent(P,X), parent(P,Y), X != Y. parent(S,C) :- parent(P,C), married(P,S). uncle(U,C) :- parent(P,C), sibling(P,U), male(U). grandparent(G,C) :- parent(G,P), parent(P,C). grandpa(X) :- grandparent(X,X), male(X).

hard_constraints.description: Compliance with biological record-keeping standards requires that an individual cannot be assigned conflicting gender identities.
Organizational relationship policies prohibit the registration of self-marriage to ensure the integrity of the family tree.
Biological lineage compliance protocols prohibit a person from being registered as their own parent.
